title: Large-Scale Diagnostic and Competency Enhancement Course for Physicians' E-Learning Readiness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: Participants (pre-service/in-service teachers) engage in project-based learning (PBL) to develop actual diagnostic tools and derive improvement strategies, acquiring core competencies for e-learning system design and operation.

learning_goals: Systematically diagnose learners' e-learning readiness using online surveys and interview techniques
Based on diagnostic results, improvement plans can be established for each domain, including e-learning infrastructure, technical competencies, and attitudes.
Through PBL (Project-Based Learning) activities, customized educational strategies can be developed and implemented to enhance e-learning readiness.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
